mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `stockInComeBillItem` (costPrice, number, amount, remark, product_id, bill_id) VALUES (#{costPrice}, #{number}, #{amount}, #{remark}, #{product.id}, #{billId})
mapper.update: UPDATE `stockInComeBillItem` SET costPrice = #{costPrice}, number = #{number}, amount = #{amount}, remark = #{remark}, product_id = #{product.id} WHERE bill_id = #{billId}
mapper.select: select id, costPrice, number, amount, remark, product_id, bill_id from `stockInComeBillItem`

select item.id,item.costPrice,item.number,item.amount,item.remark,p.id p_id,p.name p_name,p.brandName p_brandName FROM stockInComeBillItem item LEFT JOIN product p ON item.product_id=p.id WHERE item.bill_id=#{billId}
